name: Modern Snake Xenzia - 2077
description:
What's the last time you have played Classic Retro Snake Xenzia?

You have played it a lot.. 

Now it's time have some break with the boring yet addictive 

classic snake xenzia....

This is the Game which brings back all your memory from past and give you

some Goosebumps after playing it..

But This is a Twist,

You have No Snake but other Animals by which you can play.

So, Come on 

Get up and Start Something New And Fresh

The Classic Snake Xenzia is back with Modern look and feel

It has some very attractive Visual effects

you can try out this brand new game and have some fun.

Features:

* You can Play in 3 Different Modes

* You have option to Change the background of the stage

* You can also change the weather

* You can buy some Skins with your in-game Fruits

* Two Different Controls For the Game

Challange For you all....

Eat All the Fruits without Eating your tail...

Classic Game are very fun to play..

Try this out and I am Sure you will love it..

And Lastly, Don't Forget to Claim Your Welcome Bonus.
